pr_title: allow the beaconChainController to skip forward slots if it falls behind

timeline.message:
make sure post /beacon/validators handles the optional epoch

 - added integration test for this use case also.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

fix test issue.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

make internal local variables final as they're not updated.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

allow the beaconChainController to skip forward slots if it falls behind

 - added a getSlotStartTime function to calculate the time that a slot should start

 - added regression tests for getSlotStartTime

 - added a event log event for when the nodeSlot drifts, so that we can see it in the log, as it will likely mean that errors occur slightly after, especially if it is multiple epochs between them.

 - removed Thread.sleep() logic previously used for slot processing logic.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: Drift Event probably isn't the right wording here.  Probably just "Skipped Slots"?  I don't think we always need Event in there and possibly should just remove them all as redundant.
